services.title: BSc Zoology
services.description: I hold a BSc in Zoology from the University of Bristol, where I explored everything from animal communication and behavior to the impact of artificial light on marine life, blending my passion for wildlife with a strong foundation in scientific research.

services.description: I'm a passionate freelance photographer, capturing the beauty of wildlife, landscapes, and the people I meet along the way. With experience shooting on a Sony A7 IV, I've honed my skills in everything from underwater photography to dynamic drone shots, always aiming to tell a compelling story through every frame.

From capturing breathtaking drone footage to diving into marine research, my work is all about inspiring others to connect with our planet.
